name: GeoSwap
description:
In this short puzzle-platformer made for the Geo Jam 2021, you can switch around the positions of different objects in the level. Your player will move automatically, so you need to act fast! This game is a mix of puzzle solving and reaction time.

Use left click to select and move the objects.

Use right click to deselect objects if you have one selected.

Use R to restart the level if needed.

Game made for GeoJam 2021 hosted by Icoso

All art, code, and music made by me

Sounds effects made with Jfxr(The web version of Sxfr)

Made with Unity, Aseprite, and FL Studio Mobile

To download this game, click on the button below to download it. Then extract the contents of the ZIP folder to another folder and click on the .exe file to start playing. This game can also be played completely in the browser if you prefer.
